headline: Salesforce (NYSE:CRM) Expands AI Footprint with PepsiCo and UChicago Medicine Collaborations
summary: Salesforce (NYSE:CRM) recently announced two impactful initiatives: PepsiCo's adoption of Agentforce to enhance operational efficiency and customer support, and UChicago Medicine's implementation of Agentforce for Health, aimed at improving patient experiences. These developments underscore the company's commitment to AI integration in diverse industries. Last week, Salesforce's share price rose 4.5%, notably outpacing the broader market's 1.9% climb. headline: NTT DATA Announces New Industry-Ready Service for Salesforce’s Agentforce
summary: TOKYO & LONDON, June 25, 2025--Following the unveiling of NTT DATA’s Smart AI Agent™ Ecosystem, a transformative enterprise-grade framework for agentic solutions, NTT DATA today announced a new service offering for Salesforce’s Agentforce that will help clients accelerate the adoption of autonomous AI agents to work alongside humans. headline: Cognizant Expands Salesforce Partnership with New Offerings for Agentforce
summary: Cognizant (NASDAQ: CTSH) announced an expansion of its partnership with Salesforce, introducing a new suite of customer and operations transformation services built for Salesforce's Agentforce. The offerings are designed to help enterprises accelerate their shift to an AI-augmented workforce, combining human expertise with autonomous agents to drive productivity, responsiveness, and scalable impact.

headline: Over 40% of agentic AI projects will be scrapped by 2027: Gartner
summary: Many vendors are engaging in "agent washing" - the rebranding of products such as AI assistants and chatbots without significant agentic capabilities, Gartner says, estimating that only about 130 of the thousands of agentic AI vendors are real.  "Most agentic AI projects right now are early stage experiments or proofs of concept that are mostly driven by hype and are often misapplied," said Anushree Verma, Senior Director Analyst at Gartner.  Gartner predicts at least 15% of day-to-day work decisions will be made autonomously through agentic AI by 2028, up from 0% in 2024.

raw.headline: Over 40% of agentic AI projects will be scrapped by 2027: Gartner
raw.summary: Many vendors are engaging in "agent washing" - the rebranding of products such as AI assistants and chatbots without significant agentic capabilities, Gartner says, estimating that only about 130 of the thousands of agentic AI vendors are real.  "Most agentic AI projects right now are early stage experiments or proofs of concept that are mostly driven by hype and are often misapplied," said Anushree Verma, Senior Director Analyst at Gartner.  Gartner predicts at least 15% of day-to-day work decisions will be made autonomously through agentic AI by 2028, up from 0% in 2024.

headline: Infinitus deepens partnership with Salesforce to accelerate AI agent adoption in healthcare and life sciences
summary: Infinitus Systems Inc., the trusted voice AI platform powering more than 100 million minutes of healthcare conversations, today announced an expanded partnership with Salesforce, allowing joint customers to invoke Infinitus's voice AI agents to complete and automate complex administrative healthcare tasks.
